title: Don't Lose Hope for Persona 5 on Switch - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.17.20
description:
Get started with your first month free by going to http://forhims.com/gamesdaily.

If you go to http://getquip.com/games right now, you’ll get your first refill free!

Blessing and Tim talk about a new interview from Atlus that touches on Persona 5 on Switch, Siege on next gen, and more. 

Time Stamps -
00:05:35 - Housekeeping
Persona 5 Royal First Impressions is now up on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
The Roper Report   -
00:07:05 - Don’t Lose Hope For Persona 5 on Switch
00:14:48 - Rainbow Six Siege is coming to PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X
00:19:08 - “Do you think this will satisfy gamers?” - AnakinJMT
00:22:17 - Nintendo Is Likely to Suffer Global Switch Shortages From Virus
00:26:10 - Sonic the Hedgehog beats Detective Pikachu in US opening weekend
00:28:23 - Activision-Blizzard Pulling their games from Nvidia: “It was a misunderstanding”
00:31:56 - A Fun piece of Game History: It Seems A Playable Xbox Build Of StarCraft Ghost Has Leaked
00:36:36 - Out today
00:38:50 -  Hims
00:40:26 - Quip  
 Reader mail   -
00:41:37 - “WHEN THE HELL WILL WE HEAR ABOUT A NEW FABLE GAME!” - Michael Knight
00:44:02 - “Will we ever see a Playstation version of an elite controller from Playstation in the PS5 era?” - Parker Petrov
00:52:13 - Squad Up: Ayden C - PSN - AydenTheAverage
00:52:39 - You‘re Wrong
00:56:20 - Post Show
This Week’s Hosts:
Tuesday - Greg & Imran
Wednesday - Greg & Whitta
Thursday - Greg & Blessing
Friday - Blessing & Tim
